name.japanese: IGO大食いトーナメント島

description: A special island created for the International Gourmet Organization's Food Tournament. The island features multiple terrain types including mountain, desert, and forest routes for the tournament participants to navigate.

keyEvents.title: IGO Food Tournament Begins
keyEvents.description: The International Gourmet Organization hosts a tournament on this island, attracting competitors from three different anime universes.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for the historic crossover event between One Piece, Toriko, and Dragon Ball Z.

keyEvents.title: Akami Appears on the Island
keyEvents.description: The Deep Sea Glutton Akami emerges on the island, revealing the tournament's true purpose was to lure it out for capture.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes a battleground for the three protagonists to unite against a common enemy.

statusHistory.description: Island hosts the IGO Food Tournament and battle against Akami

trivia: This location exists only in the crossover special and is not part of the One Piece world canon
The island was designed to accommodate characters from three different anime universes
The tournament was a ruse to gather strong fighters to help capture Akami
